CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: Without any device optimization , the device afforded an open circuit voltage ( V oc ) of 0.50 V , a short - circuit current density ( J sc ) of 1.42 mA / cm^2 , a fill factor ( FF ) of 42.4% , and a preliminary power conversion efficiency ( PCE ) of 0.30% under an AM 1.5 simulated solar light at 100 mW / cm^2 ( Figure 7 ).

Let's think step by step.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| open circuit voltage (V oc) |
| short-circuit current density (J sc) |
| fill factor (FF) |
| preliminary power conversion efficiency (PCE) |

These are the material properties mentioned in the paragraph.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material name" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| open circuit voltage (Voc) |
| short-circuit current density (Jsc) |
| fill factor (FF) |
| power conversion efficiency (PCE) |

These are the material properties mentioned in the paragraph. I removed "preliminary" from "preliminary power conversion efficiency" to make the material name more precise.
